properties.name: kms.api-key-limit
properties.description: Maximum number of API keys allowed per user account.

properties.name: security.token.secret-key
properties.description: A signing key to use to digitally sign a JWT.

properties.name: security.token.access-token-expiration-minutes
properties.description: Sets the access token expiration minutes.

properties.name: security.token.refresh-token-expiration-days
properties.description: Sets the refresh token expiration days.

properties.name: stripe.secret-key
properties.description: Key used in backend code to send any request to Stripe's API.

properties.name: mailgun.domain
properties.description: Sets the Mailgun domain for this configuration.

properties.name: mailgun.secret-key
properties.description: Key used in backend code to send any request to Mailgun's API.

properties.name: mailgun.from.name
properties.description: Sets the default sender name for messages that do not specify an address themselves.

properties.name: mailgun.from.email
properties.description: Sets the default sender email for messages that do not specify an address themselves.

properties.name: geolite2.name
properties.description: Name of the GeoLite2 mmdb database.

properties.name: geolite2.directory
properties.description: Directory where to download database to.
